short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Always show the subject field when replying in Gmail!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When replying to an email in Gmail, the "subject" field is not displayed by default. Fix this with tiny "ShowSubjectGmail" extension. Tiny? Yes, it's only 2 KB!

Contact: nouvellecollection@gmail.com
